title: Democrats are Desperately Trying to Bury This Story (Ep 1158)
description:
In this episode, I address what the Democrats are really hiding in the emerging, explosive connections between the Bidens, Ukraine, election interference, the Spygate scandal, and George Soros. I also address the Trump/economic inequality myth still being promoted by liberals.News Picks:Will Hunter Biden be forced to testify in the Senate impeachment trial?

 

The phony Democrats are claiming to be shocked by the latest allegation of Russian hacking.

 

This John Solomon article from March describes the George Soros/Ukraine connections the Democrats are concerned about.

 

College football fans love the President.

 

Looney liberals meltdown after this famous Hollywood actor shakes hands with President Trump.

 

Whiney liberals are complaining that fifty thousand dollars from the government for their student loans isn’t enough.

 

Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
